item.title: Cayman Typography
item.description: Text Text can be **bold**, _italic_, or ~~strikethrough~~. [Links](https://github.com) should be blue with no underlines (unless hovered over). Text can be bold, italic, or strikethrough. Links should be blue with no underlines (unless hovered over).
